snippet: The five-story Loew’s Paradise, a baroque-style masterpiece, was the center of Bronx night life for decades and reopened in 2005 after major renovations.
lead_paragraph: The five-story Loew’s Paradise, a baroque-style masterpiece, was the center of Bronx night life for decades and reopened in 2005 after major renovations.

headline.seo: Fire Damages Paradise Theater, a Bronx Landmark
headline.main: Fire Badly Damages Paradise Theater, a Bronx Landmark
headline.print_headline: Fire Badly Damages Paradise Theater, a Bronx Landmark
